inclusion.criterion: Serum ALT at least 1.5x the upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: For chronic HBV: Known positive serum HBeAg for at least 6 months; Presence of HBV DNA in serum
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: For chronic HCV: Presence of anti-HCV in serum within 6 months of enrollment; Positive serum HCV RNA (enrollment)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Treatment (within past 3 months) with interferon, ribavirin, lamivudine, entecavir, or adefovir dipivoxil
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current treatment with any drug or dietary supplement that could affect serum transaminase values (e.g., milk thistle)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy or inability to practice contraception in patients capable of bearing or fathering children
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Decompensated liver disease (as indicated by total bilirubin >4 mg/dL; albumin <3 g/dL; prolonged (>2 sec over control) prothrombin time; or history of bleeding esophageal varices, ascites or hepatic encephalopathy)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Active alcohol use, drug abuse, and/or psychiatric problems that, in the investigator's opinion, could interfere with participation in the study
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection and is on combination therapy with IFN and RBV. He has a history of inguinal hernia surgery but no other significant medical history.
